item.description:
Greg has organized this in the past and I just love the Cello Chix, so when I saw that they are playing at a venue near me, I thought I'd put it on the calendar!

The Cello Chix play Rock, Jazz, Pop and Latin music on electric cellos. It's pretty wild!

Check out the following websites for more info on the Cello Chix:

http://www.myspace.co...

http://www.cellochix....

Check out the following website for more info on Plough and Stars:

http://www.ploughands...

Please wear something GREEN. It can be any shade of GREEN. It can be a GREEN shirt, GREEN pants, GREEN jewelry, color your hair GREEN, or come as a witch with GREEN make-up, or dress up as Kermit the frog. lol It will be easy to find people if we're all wearing the same color ... GREEN. I think you get the gist of it by now. lol

Bring some cash. I think there's a cover charge - $7.00, I think.

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a GREEN shirt. I'm asking everyone to wear GREEN. So, look for the group of people in GREEN clothes!
item.why: To listen to live electric cello music.
item.name: Cello Chix
